post.author: 이석준
post.content:
My Name is Omari Williams and I am a senior recruiter with Gurulink.ca. I have identified a new J2EE developer role that just came in and you appear to be a good fit based on your resume. Please take a look at the role via the link below and let me know your thoughts or interest either way. Time is of the essence so I have short-listed your name and would like to discuss this opportunity with you as soon as possible. You can view the role (s) by simply by clicking on the links below:
Web Developer (Front End) http://www.gurulink.ca/jobview.asp?JobID=1534
Your resume has (of course) not been submitted and will not be without your explicit permission. Please review the details and call me at your earliest convenience so I can answer any qu! estions you may have as well as provide you with some more information about the opportunity and the company.
Should you decide you are not interested in exploring these opportunities I would be very appreciative if you would forward this email on to friends or former colleagues.
Thanks in advance, hope to speak with you soon.
Omari Williams
Omari Williams Recruitment Consultant omari@gurulink.ca
post.title: Front end developer contract role available
